sentences.en: Critics attacked the film as blasphemous.
sentences.cn: 评论家抨击这部电影亵渎神明。

sentences.en: Having or showing contempt for God or holy things; blasphemous.
sentences.cn: 亵渎上帝或神圣事物的; 不敬神的.

sentences.en: His language was irreverent, not to say Blasphemous.
sentences.cn: 他的言语即使不算渎神, 至少也是不虔敬的.

sentences.en: I would almost blasphemous by saying it's better than Iron Man but I don't know.
sentences.cn: 或许,如果我说这部电影甚至超越了钢铁侠有些不敬,但,好吧,我也说不清.

sentences.en: Nietzsche rejected God's law and wrote some overtly blasphemous things.
sentences.cn: 尼采拒绝上帝的律法,并且写了一些渎神的作品.

sentences.en: She was accused of being blasphemous.
Some see such images as a blasphemous affront to faith and an attack on believers.
sentences.cn: 在一些信徒看来,这些“艺术”无疑是对宗教信仰的亵渎侮辱,以及是对信徒的挑战.

sentences.en: The book was declared blasphemous and all copies ordered to be burnt.
sentences.cn: 这本书被断定为亵渎神明之作,命令全数焚毀.

sentences.en: The Don spoke quietly gravely to pierce through the blasphemous delirium.
sentences.cn: 堂安静地、阴沉地说,穿过这不敬的胡说.

sentences.en: The people in the room were shocked by his blasphemous language.
sentences.cn: 满屋的人都对他那侮慢的语言感到愤慨.

sentences.en: Who dares insult us with this blasphemous mockery?
sentences.cn: 谁敢用这种该死的玩笑来侮辱我们?

words.tran_cn: 亵渎神明；轻视上帝或神祗

trans.tran_cn: 亵渎上帝的，亵渎宗教信仰的
trans.tran_en: You can describe someone who shows disrespect for God or a religion as blasphemous. You can also describe what they are saying or doing as blasphemous.
